sections.heading: Forgery; instruments; how described
sections.text: In any indictment for falsely making, altering, forging, printing, photographing, uttering, disposing of or putting off any instrument, it shall be sufficient to set forth the purport and value thereof.SourceG.S.1873, c. 58, ยง 414, p. 817;R.S.1913, ยง 9052;C.S.1922
